data.name: S_ANDROID_ROBOT_LIC
data.value: The Android robot is reproduced or modified from work created and shared by Google and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 3.0 Attribution License.

data.name: S_APK_ICON_LIC
data.value: The APK icon is licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.

data.name: S_MISSING_ADB_OVERRIDE
data.value: Could not get ADB version from provided path.

data.name: S_ADB_VERSION_LOW_OVERRIDE
data.value: ADB version from provided path is too low.

data.name: S_EMPTY_TRASH
data.comment: The action to empty the recycle bin

data.name: S_ROOT_FORBID
data.value: Root access cannot be enabled on selected device.

data.name: S_NEW_DEVICE_TIP
data.value: Pair and/or connect a WiFi device (without using mDNS)

data.name: S_RESTART_APP
data.value: Restart app for changes to take effect

data.name: S_READ_FILE_ERROR
data.value: Could not pull file in order to read it.

data.name: S_WRITE_FILE_ERROR
data.value: Could not push file back to device.

data.name: S_DISABLE_MDNS
data.value: ADB server needs to be restarted in order to disable mDNS.

data.name: S_CONFLICTING_APPS
data.value: File Explorer monitoring is not available due to the following apps running:

data.name: S_DISK_USAGE_PROGRESS
data.value: Push/pull progress is displayed in total bytes transferred. Percentage is available only when total size is known.

data.name: S_DEPLOY_REDIRECTION_ERROR
data.value: Unable to deploy executable. Disk usage progress method will be used instead.

data.name: S_ADVANCED_DRAG
data.value:
Monitoring File Explorer enables the app to perform Drag / Clipboard Pull operations directly to the destination folder.
Otherwise, Pull is performed to the app temp folder, from which File Explorer receives the file as a stream, which has to use a small buffer. These two added steps slow down the process significantly.
The feature is auto-disabled for other selected file managers.

data.name: S_ADVANCED_DRAG_SPLASH
data.value: Enable only if you intend to use the app with File Explorer. You can always change this in the settings.

data.name: S_NEW_VERSION_MSG
data.value: Welcome to a new ADB Explorer version! The release notes are available on GitHub.

data.name: S_FUSE_DRIVE_TOOLTIP
data.value: FUSE drive. • Symbolic links are not supported • File names cannot contain " * / : < > ? \ | • File names are case insensitive • Installation of APKs is not supported

data.name: S_DISABLE_ANIMATION
data.value:
The app has many animations that are enabled as part of the fluent design. The side views animation is always disabled when the app window is maximized on a secondary display.
• Checking this setting disables all app animations except progress bars, progress rings, and drive usage bars.

data.name: S_RESET_SETTINGS
data.value: All app settings will be reset upon closing the app. This cannot be undone. Are you sure?

data.name: S_WSA_LAUNCH
data.value: Select Launch if ADB is already authorized in WSA. To approve ADB, open WSA advanced settings.

data.name: S_WIN_ROOT_ILLEGAL
data.value: {0} of the selected files cannot be created under a Windows drive root.

data.name: S_DEPLOY_REDIRECTION
data.value: A helper program for reading push/pull progress from ADB.

data.name: S_DEPLOY_REDIRECTION_ARM
data.value: Might falsely trigger some anti-virus programs.

data.name: S_PROGRESS_METHOD_TOOLTIP
data.value: Select an option to display explanation

data.comment: The content of a button used to change a path

data.name: S_BUTTON_CONTINUE_TOOLTIP
data.comment: The tooltip of a button used to continue to the next step

data.name: S_BUTTON_MORE_INFO_TOOLTIP
data.comment: The tooltip of a button used to display an info message

data.name: S_NEW_VERSION
data.comment: 0 = App display name. 1 = new version number

data.name: S_BUTTON_CLOSE
data.comment: The content of a button to dismiss a message dialog

data.name: S_HELP_ON_ADB
data.value: This app is a UI for ADB - Android Debug Bridge. To use the app, you need to have ADB on your PC. ADB is available as part of the Android SDK Platform Tools. You can use the provided link to download the SDK Platform Tools. Unfortunately, we cannot provide ADB with the app due to licensing restrictions.

data.name: S_DELETE_PERMANENT

data.value: An error occurred while trying to list the contents of this folder. Visible content may be incomplete.

data.name: S_SETTINGS_COMPACT_VIEW
data.comment: The setting used to enable the file operations compact view

data.name: S_SETTINGS_STOP_ON_SYNC

data.name: S_SETTINGS_PARALLEL_OPERATIONS
data.comment: The setting used to allow performing simultaneous operations on separate devices

data.name: S_SETTINGS_MEDIA_RESCAN
data.comment: The setting used to enable forcing the device to perform a media rescan after a successful push operation batch

data.name: S_SETTINGS_POLL_DRIVES
data.comment: The setting used to toggle polling for device drives when in drive view

data.name: S_SETTINGS_ENABLE_TRASH
data.comment: The setting used to enable the recycle bin (trash)

data.name: S_SETTINGS_APK
data.comment: The setting used to enable everything related to APK

data.name: S_SETTINGS_SHOW_EXTENSIONS

data.comment: The setting used to enable showing hidden items in the browser

data.name: S_SETTINGS_SYSTEM_APPS
data.comment: The setting used to allow displaying system apps in package view

data.name: S_SETTINGS_EXPLORER_MONITORING

data.name: S_SETTINGS_DOUBLE_CLICK_OPEN

data.name: S_SETTINGS_OVERRIDE_ADB

data.name: S_SETTINGS_DEFAULT_FOLDER

data.comment: The location displayed in the target column of a permanent delete file operation

data.name: S_LOCATION_NA
data.comment: Displayed in the source / target of a file operation when those are unknown

data.name: S_PATH_INVALID
data.comment: Displayed when an invalid path argument is provided for app launch

data.name: S_CUSTOM_DATA_PATH
data.comment: The title of the error message when an invalid path argument is provided

data.name: S_MENU_EMPTY
data.comment: Displayed when the context menu is empty

data.name: S_ITEM_COPY
data.comment: A copy of an item. 0 = item name

data.name: S_POPUP_UNIX_NAMING
data.value: Adheres to Unix naming rules (via ADB)
data.comment: Will be shown if a file name doesn't meet Unix naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_FUSE_NAMING
data.comment: Will show if a file name doesn't meet FUSE naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_WINDOWS_NAMING
data.comment: Will show if a file name doesn't meet Windows naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_DRIVE_ROOT_NAMING
data.value: Adheres to Windows drive root naming rules
data.comment: Will show if a file name doesn't meet Windows drive root naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_UNIQUE_NAME
data.comment: Will show if a file name isn't unique in the current location, according to the file system naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_WARNING
data.comment: The title of the paste and pull warnings popup

data.name: S_POPUP_SELECTED_WINDOWS_NAMING
data.value: A selected file violates Windows naming rules
data.comment: Will show if a selected file doesn't meet Windows naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_SELECTED_DRIVE_ROOT
data.value: A selected file violates Windows drive root naming rules
data.comment: Will show if a selected file doesn't meet Windows drive root naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_SELECTED_UNIQUE
data.value: Some selected files have conflicting names on FUSE / Windows
data.comment: Will show when selecting files on a non-FUSE drive whose names differ only by upper / lower case

data.name: S_POPUP_SELECTED_FUSE
data.value: A selected file violates FUSE naming rules
data.comment: Will show if a selected file doesn't meet FUSE naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_COPIED_UNIQUE
data.value: Some copied files have conflicting names on FUSE
data.comment: Will show when copied files' names differ only by upper / lower case

data.name: S_POPUP_COPIED_FUSE_NAMING
data.value: A copied file violates FUSE naming rules
data.comment: Will show if a copied file doesn't meet FUSE naming rules

data.name: S_POPUP_NON_FILE
data.value: A selected item is not a file / folder
data.comment: Will show when selecting an item that can't be copied

data.name: S_POPUP_CHECKBOX_TOOLTIP
data.value: Can be undone using Reset App Settings, or manually in settings file
data.comment: The tooltip displayed on the "Never show again" checkbox in the paste warnings popup

data.name: S_POPUP_HIDE_TOOLTIP
data.comment: The tooltip of the button used to hide the paste warnings popup

data.name: S_POPUP_CHECKBOX
data.comment: The paste popup permanent hide checkbox content

data.name: S_DEVICE_WSA_APP
data.comment: Represents the WSA app, not the device itself

data.name: S_ROOT_STATUS_TITLE
data.comment: 0 = the status (enabled, forbidden, etc.)

data.name: S_STAT_ROOT_UNCHECKED
data.comment: Root status - it is yet unknown whether the device supports root access

data.name: S_STAT_ROOT_FORBIDDEN
data.comment: Root access - the device does not support root access

data.name: S_BUTTON_ENABLE
data.comment: Toggle button - enable

data.name: S_BUTTON_DISABLE
data.comment: Toggle button - disable

data.name: S_PLACEHOLDER_PAIRING_CODE
data.comment: The placeholder text for the pairing code textbox

data.name: S_PLACEHOLDER_HOST
data.comment: The placeholder text for the IP address textbox

data.name: S_PLACEHOLDER_PORT
data.comment: The placeholder text for the connect port textbox

data.name: S_PLACEHOLDER_PAIRING_PORT
data.comment: The placeholder text for the pairing port textbox

data.name: S_BUTTON_PAIR_CONNECT
data.comment: The content of a button to pair and connect a new manually connected device

data.name: S_DEVICE_SAVED
data.comment: A saved device that has been manually connected

data.name: S_DEVICE_QR
data.comment: An mDNS service device that is in the process of pairing using the QR code

data.name: S_DEVICE_READY_PAIR
data.comment: An mDNS service device that is ready to pair

data.name: S_CLEAR_ALL
data.comment: The tooltip of a button used to clear all textboxes in the connect new device

data.name: S_ADD_NEW_DEVICE
data.comment: The tooltip of the new device icon

data.name: S_DEVICE_UNAUTH_NONAME
data.comment: The name displayed for a device that hasn't authorized ADB yet, and we don't know its name

data.name: S_SERVICE_NONAME
data.comment: The name displayed for a service device for which we don't have a name yet

data.name: S_TOOLTIP_BROWSING
data.comment: The tooltip displayed for the device that is currently open for browsing

data.name: S_BUTTON_BROWSE
data.comment: The content of the button to open a device for browsing

data.name: S_BUTTON_CONNECT
data.comment: The button to try to connect an old / new device manually

data.name: S_DRIVE_FREE_SPACE
data.comment: 0 = free space on drive (in B/KB/MB/GB). 1 = total drive capacity (in B/KB/MB/GB)

data.name: S_DRIVE_EMPTY_TRASH
data.comment: The notification displayed on the recycle bin drive when it is empty

data.name: S_DRIVE_APK_ITEMS
data.comment: The item count on the temp drive, singular

data.name: S_DRIVE_APK_ITEMS_PLURAL
data.comment: The item count on the temp drive, plural

data.name: S_DRIVE_PACKAGE_PLURAL
data.comment: The installed apps drive items count display, plural

data.name: S_FILEOP_ERROR
data.comment: 0 = an internal error message

data.name: S_FILEOP_VALIDATED
data.comment: A file operation status - validated

data.name: S_FILEOP_COMPLETED
data.comment: A file operation status - completed

data.name: S_FILEOP_SUBITEM_FAILED
data.comment: File operation sub items failed status. 0 = failed items count

data.name: S_FILEOP_TOTAL
data.comment: File operation total sub items count

data.name: S_FILEOP_PREV
data.comment: A file operation from a previous batch

data.name: S_FILEOP_RUNNING
data.comment: File operation status - running (in progress)

data.name: S_FILEOP_WAITING
data.comment: File operation status - queued (waiting)

data.name: S_FILEOP_FAILED
data.comment: File operation status - failed

data.name: S_FILEOP_CANCELED
data.comment: File operation status - canceled

data.name: S_FILEOP_PREVIOUS
data.comment: File operation status - A file operation from a previous batch

data.name: S_ACTION_MOVE
data.comment: The action to move a file (cut-paste)

data.name: S_ACTION_RECYCLE
data.comment: The action to recycle an item - send it to the trash

data.name: S_ACTION_UPDATE
data.comment: The action to update the date modified of a file according to its name

data.name: S_DRIVE_USAGE_TOOLTIP
data.comment: The tooltip for the drive usage percentage progress bar

data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.name: ScrollBar_ScrollToRightEndCommand
data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.name: ScrollBar_PageRightCommand
data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.name: ScrollBar_LineLeftCommand
data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.name: ScrollBar_LineRightCommand
data.comment: ScrollBar ContextMenu

data.name: S_MENU_UNDO
data.comment: TextBox ContextMenu

data.name: S_MENU_REDO
data.comment: TextBox ContextMenu

data.name: S_NOTIFICATIONS_TITLE
data.comment: The title of the notifications area in the settings pane

data.name: S_TOOLTIP_MORE_INFO
data.comment: The tooltip of a button used to display a notification message

data.name: S_LANG_NOTIFICATION_TITLE
data.comment: The title of the notification message about the app language

data.name: S_LANG_NOTIFICATION
data.value: Select your app language of choice in the settings. Translation progress is displayed for the selected language. Please help us localize the app to your language on Weblate.
data.comment: The content of the app language notification message

data.name: S_GOTO_WEBLATE
data.comment: The content of the button used to open the link to our project on Weblate

data.name: S_FILE_SOCKET
data.comment: The socket Unix file type

data.name: S_FILE_BLOCK
data.comment: The block device Unix file type

data.name: S_FILE_CHAR
data.comment: The char device Unix file type

data.name: S_FILE_FIFO
data.comment: The FIFO (First-In First-Out) Unix file type

data.name: S_FILE_UNKNOWN
data.comment: An unknown file type

data.name: S_FILE_BROKEN_LINK
data.comment: A symbolic link that points to a file that doesn't exist

data.name: S_NAV_HISTORY
data.comment: The tooltip of the menu that displays the navigation history
